entry.tran: （某组织或团体的）成员，会员；（尤指宗教团体的）教友
entry.def: You can refer to the members of a particular organization or group, especially a religious group, as brethren.

example.ex: We must help our brethren, it is our duty...
example.tran: 我们必须帮助我们的教友，这是我们的责任。

example.ex: Sri Lankans share a common ancestry with their Indian brethren.
example.tran: 斯里兰卡人和他们的印度兄弟有共同的祖先。

means.word_mean: 1. (plural) the lay members of a male religious order
